description:
View version of Equalizer with 1-indexed band keys

# Band Indexing - **Internal**: `Vec<EqualizerBand>` with 0-based indexing - **API**: `BTreeMap<String, EqualizerBand>` with 1-based string keys ("1", "2", "3")

# Example JSON ```json { "bypass": false, "bands": { "1": { "kind": "Parametric", "gain": 0.0, "frequency": 1000.0, "q": 0.7, "bypass": false }, "2": { "kind": "Parametric", "gain": 0.0, "frequency": 2000.0, "q": 0.7, "bypass": false }, "3": { "kind": "Parametric", "gain": 0.0, "frequency": 3000.0, "q": 0.7, "bypass": false } } } ```

bands.description: EQ bands indexed by 1-based string keys matching API paths

bypass.description: Master EQ bypass - when true, all bands are disabled
